entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with a few flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 07 January 2023
